column1: #Text=We think Rust is the best language for new systems software!
#Text=Our core platform is all in Rust, from microservices in our distributed control plane to our high-performance data services.
#Text=Everything we do is built on Linux and we are rethinking how control and data planes are built on modern programmable kernels using eBPF, Wireguard, io_uring, and other such features.
#Text=Rust gives us the best balance of performance and safety for our customers.
#Text=And it is a lot of fun too!
#Text=Salary $100,000 to $200,000You will love this job if: You love Rust!
#Text=You have beaten your head against web infrastructure and distributed systems and won!
#Text=You know how to balance rapid development with long-term code maintainability and supportability.
#Text=Your range of experience with frontend, backend, machine learning, or full-stack is one of your superpowers.
#Text=You are an experienced debugger unfazed by the firefighting needed when production environments are in flames.
#Text=You are detail-oriented and and passionate about creating an awesome user experience.
#Text=You are comfortable with a variety of modern software frameworks and learn new tools as a matter of course or just for fun.
#Text=You put EQ above ego and focus on team success helping your team members through code reviews.

#Text=Health Care Plan (Medical, Dental & Vision) Paid Time Off (Vacation, Sick & Public Holidays) Family Leave (Maternity, Paternity) Training & Development Work From Home You know how to balance rapid development with long-term code maintainability and supportability Your range of experience with frontend, backend, machine learning, or full-stack is one of your superpowers You are an experienced debugger unfazed by the firefighting needed when production environments are in flames You are detail-oriented and and passionate about creating an awesome user experience You are comfortable with a variety of modern software frameworks and learn new tools as a matter of course or just for fun Salary $100,000 to $200,000 Health Care Plan (Medical, Dental & Vision) Paid Time Off (Vacation, Sick & Public Holidays) Family Leave (Maternity, Paternity) Training & Development Work From Home
